items.title: This 3-in-1 Qi2 charging station is also a lamp and it’s down to just $25.50 today (62% off)

Lamicall 3-in-1 Qi2 Charging Station with LED base

Buy for $25.50 (Reg. $70)

What we love

This 3-in-1 charging station can handle your iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods in one compact setup with a Qi2-certified 15W charging pad for iPhone, a built-in Apple Watch puck, and a wireless pad for earbuds. The highlight here is the LED-lit base with five color options, giving it a soft ambient glow. This versatile charging solution is worth considering if you’re ready to swap out the usual chargers for something a bit more stylish and functional on your desk or nightstand.

items.title: Olympics-Armed gang rob jewellery store in Cortina d'Ampezzo

items.title: South Sudan hosts over 600,000 refugees, asylum seekers: UNHCR
items.summary: JUBA, Jan. 14 (Xinhua) -- South Sudan is hosting 605,062 refugees and asylum seekers across 161,400 households, settled in 29 locations nationwide as of December 2025, the United Nations refugee agency said on Wednesday. Read full story

items.title: Azerbaijan releases four Armenian prisoners in sign of deepening peace
items.summary: TBILISI/BAKU, Jan 14 (Reuters) - Azerbaijan has ‌released four Armenian prisoners arrested during wars between the two countries in 2020 ‌and 2023, Armenia said on Wednesday, in a further sign of normalising ‌ties between the long-standing foes. Read full story

items.title: South Africa unveils decade-long strategy to combat FMD
items.summary: CAPE TOWN, Jan. 14 (Xinhua) -- South Africa has outlined a 10-year national strategy on foot-and-mouth disease (FMD) containment, announcing the launch of a nationwide vaccination campaign and plans to seek a declaration of the outbreak as a national disaster. Read full story

items.title: Ghanaian monthly economy expands 3.8 pct in October 2025
items.summary: ACCRA, Jan. 14 (Xinhua) -- The Ghana Statistical Service said Wednesday that the country's economy grew 3.8 percent in October 2025, a 0.8 percentage point increase over the same period in 2024. Read full story

This upgraded sidecar model hit the scene at the end of 2024 with a $3,899 full price, which is where it kept for most of 2025, though discounts in the early months, November, and December saw discounts drop costs to $3,509 and the $3,499 low. JBL Quantum 100 Wired Over-Ear Gaming Headphones

Buy for $20 (Reg. $45)

What we love

It doesn’t get much better than this if you’re after budget headset for gaming. The Quantum 100 is a wired over-ear set with a detachable mic and memory-foam cushions. It uses a standard 3.5mm jack for broad compatibility with PC and consoles, and its tuning – according to JBL – focuses on keeping in-game audio clear and easy to pick apart, similar to how it’s done in some of its more expensive models.

more…
